General.Name: Saint Jean Groupe Société anonyme
General.Description: Saint Jean Groupe Société anonyme, through its subsidiaries, operates in the agri-food sector in France. The company offers ravioles, dumplings, fresh pasta, and delicatessen products under the Saint, Royans, Ravioles de Romans, Quenelles La Royale, and Comptoir du Pastier brand names. The company is headquartered in Dardilly, France.
General.Address: 59 Chemin du Moulin Carron, Dardilly, France, 69573
